name: Chicken Deep Fried in Pandanus Leaves (gai hor bai dtoei)
recipeInstructions: 1. Cut each chicken thigh into 5 pieces.
2. Using a pestle and mortar, pound coriander roots with salt, garlic, ginger, star anise (if using), and peppercorns into a fine paste.
3. Stir in the soy sauce, palm sugar, vinegar, sesame oil and Worcestershire sauce.
4. Use half of the mixture to marinate the chicken overnight (or up to 3 days) refrigerated.
5. When ready to cook dilute the remaining mixture with a tablespoon or so of water to make a dipping sauce.
6. Remove the chicken from the marinade and wrap each peice in a pandanus leaf.
7. Deep fry in oil over a medium heat being careful not to burn.
8. Drain then rest for a minute.
9. Serve sprinkled with the roasted sesame seeds, with the dipping sauce.
